title: Help cant find answer anywhere!!!
body:
if you buy two 3day xp boost, or two 3day ip boosts, will they stacks??

meaning will you get 3-4x the amount in those 3 days?

replies.body:
They stack in terms of *time* but not in terms of the percentage of the boost. This means if you grab two *3-day IP boosts*, you'll have 6 days of IP boosts.

Let me know if you have any other questions. ^.^
I believe it just adds time so it will be a total of 6 days of whatever boost it was.
